Chase Atlantic.

Cairns, Queensland's Own Alternative R&B Band And Production Trio Formed In 2014.

  • Clinton Cave

    Meet the talented Musician of Chase Atlantic, Clinton Cave. The older brother of Mitchel Cave. He plays numerous instruments from guitars to trumpets. Clinton Cave has got grooves and skills like no other.

  • Mitchel Cave

    Meet the talented Singer of Chase Atlantic, Mitchel Cave. The younger brother of Clinton Cave. He sings and raps many genres. With vocals hailing from heaven, he's got you by a chokehold with his voice.

  • Clinton Cave

    Meet the talented Musical Artist of Chase Atlantic, Christian Anthony. He's the best of both worlds. Vocals like Mitchel and skills like Clinton.
